text: Ara yakhana musa amadera nirdharita-sthale ese paumchulena ebam tamra prabhu tamra sathe katha balalena, tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Amake darsana da'o, ami tomake dekhabo.’’ Tini balalena -- ''tumi kakhana'i amake dekhate pabe na, baram paharatira dike taka'o, yadi ta tara jayagaya sthira thake tabe tumi amake dekhabe.’’ Tarapara yakhana tamra prabhu paharatite jyotismana halena takhana tini take curna-bicurna karalena, ara musa pare gelena sanjnahina haye. Tarapara yakhana tini cetana pelena, tini balalena -- ''tomara'i saba mahima! Ami tomara'i dike phirachi, ara ami haba muminadera madhye agrani.’’
